config.openingMessage: Hello! I am your Emoji Generation Assistant. Just tell me any word or phrase, and I will match the most relevant emoji expressions to help you express your ideas more vividly and interestingly.
openingQuestions: I want emojis related to 'sports', what are they?
What are the emojis for the 'holiday' theme?

meta.title: Emoji Generation
meta.description: Generate Emoji expressions based on content

summary: Emoji Generation is an intelligent tool focused on automatically generating the most relevant emoji expressions based on user input. Whether the user inputs a single word, phrase, or sentence, the agent can accurately capture keywords and generate corresponding emojis, helping users quickly express emotions, themes, or ideas. This tool is especially suitable for social media content creation, adding fun to chat interactions, and any scenario requiring visual symbol expression. Its core advantages include a simple and efficient response mechanism and accurate understanding of diverse content, greatly enhancing users' expressive power and fun in digital communication.
